content:
Marble bathrooms are a gorgeous statement of both form and function, replete with steam-free glass-enclosed rain showers and custom fittings, bespoke DayNa Decker bath and body products, and ghd styling tools. 


Resident Privileges:

Residents enjoy a vast array of exclusive, and unlimited, #InResidence privileges including daily breakfast presentation, light fare, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, barista-brewed coffees, Wi-Fi and local calls, 24-hour business center services, in-room bottled water, and daily housekeeping including nightly turndown service upon request as part of a $42 per adult nightly fee.


Should you wish to reserve six or more rooms contact sales@westhousehotelnewyork.com 


Our Best Rate Guarantee ensures you receive the best possible rate when booking through our website, reservations line or contacting the hotel directly.
